title: Infinite Loading Screen
description: If you're experiencing an infinite loading screen, you have a bug with BCML. It's an easy enough fix, but it may take a couple of tries to clear it up.
steps: Delete your BCML Merged Folder
Open bcml and remerge your mods
Launch and play your game, if the issue persists start again at step 1 until it clears up

title: Missing Walls/Floors/Textures
description: If you walk into a shrine and find you have no textures on any of the floors or anywhere else, you're missing the collision actors mod or have a mod priority issue.
steps: Ensure you place it above all Dangerous to go Alone mods to avoid priority issues

title: Second Wind Compatibility
description: As of right now Second wind SHOULD work with DtgA if placed lower in priority than DtgA mods. However, things change a lot in DtgA and sometimes new inconsistencies can be introduced. If you are experiencing issues it is recommended to turn this mod off for now and see if your issues go away.

title: Can I play on the switch, or on real wii U hardware?
description: No, DtgA is not compatible with the switch or the original wii U hardware, you need BCML and Cemu to make DtgA work at all.
